channel.title: Steam is not running, cannot play game blah blah
channel.description:
[img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/741929/wtfl4d2steamerror.jpg[/img]
What do. Steam [b]IS[/b] Running. Restarted steam. no dice, Deleted that Clientregistry.blob file restarted. Same Shit over again, anyone know what to do.

item.title: Steam is not running, cannot play game blah blah

item.description:
make shortcut on desktop right click on game put -steam at the end of target box
